prompts: Create a fairy-type Pokemon that looks adorable and has a round shape with big eyes.
Imagine a small pink creature with fluffy features and a cheerful expression, perfect for a cozy forest.
Design a Pokemon that embodies cuteness, featuring pastel colors and a whimsical nature.
Show me a charming little Pokemon with large ears and a curly tail, suitable for urban adventures.
Give me a playful creature that sparkles like magic, with a soft body and friendly demeanor.
Generate a Pokemon that has a gentle personality and lives in serene grasslands, radiating positivity.
Make a pink, fluffy Pokemon that resembles a marshmallow and has a curious attitude towards its surroundings.
